title: Champion Mastery 6 & 7
body:
How would I go about obtaining a "Yasuo permanent" or a "Yasuo shard"?{{champion:157}} 
Or how would I get 500 blue essences?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Champion shards can be obtained by opening chests, champion permanents can be obtained by rerolling 3 champion shards.

Blue essence is obtained by disenchanting champion shards.

Hope this helps,
Seph
